hero.title: DONATE
hero.subtitle: You can make a difference today. It starts with believing things can change.

introduction.title: PLEASE GIVE. EVERY CONTRIBUTION MATTERS
introduction.description1: Your entire donation goes directly to supporting our programs and services.
introduction.description2: For donations exceeding $20, we will issue a donation receipt. Thank you for your generous contribution.

cash.title: Donate by Cash
cash.description: Donations can be made in cash when participating in any of KCWN's events and workshops in person. Simply place money or change into the donation box located at the registration desk.

etransfer.title: Donate by E-transfer
etransfer.description: Donations made through your online banking webpage. You can also send your donation via email.

creditCard.title: Donate by Credit Card
creditCard.description: Donate now using your credit card. Click the button to connect to the credit card payment gateway and complete your contribution securely.
